page.title: 16Business in The Lee
page.content: There is a{shop}with a Post Office in Lee Common which sells food, including meat & sweets, & some haberdashery & stationery. Nearby is an off-licence, supplying soft & alcoholic drinks & lending glasses for parties & other events. Of the 4{public houses}in the area, the Cock & Rabbit, facing The Lee green, has a larger restaurant than the Old Swan at Kingswood. The Gate, on the King's Ash - Swan Bottom road serves bar food & attracts young people with its musical evenings, while the Bugle in Lee Common has a pool table. All 4 are Free Houses, serving a variety of beers, wines & spirits. There is also a{kennels}which boards dogs, which is situated in Swan Bottom.
